summary:
• Grant of Employee Options: 3,059,190 options issued under the Oceania Healthcare Share Option Plan (10.6% of total options outstanding).
  • Exercise Terms:
  • Exercise Price: NZ$0.65 (based on 5-day VWAP prior to 26 May 2025).
  • Vesting/Exercise Period: 10 business days post-2028 results announcement, ending 90 days after vesting.
  • Cashless Settlement: Net shares issued based on market value vs. exercise price.
  • Purpose: Retention/alignment of CEO and employees with shareholders via long-term incentives.
  • Tax Treatment: OCA to cover tax on employee benefits, with share issuance adjusted for tax differentials.

No material impact on immediate trading/capital structure; potential dilution post-2028 exercise.

• Asset Divestment: Spark NZ to sell its 10% stake in HTAL to Hutchison Telecommunications (Amsterdam) BV.
  • Transaction Value: Sale priced at A$0.032/share, a 45% premium to the upper end of HTAL's Independent Expert valuation range (A$0.009–A$0.022) and 39% premium to the 3-month VWAP.
  • Proceeds & Use: NZ$47 million expected in July 2025, earmarked for net debt reduction.
  • Strategic Rationale: Aligns with Spark’s review of non-core assets.

Omitted: Background details, contact info, company description.

Takeover Scheme Announcement Summary:

  • Acquirer: Shift4 Payments, LLC (US-based payment processor).
  • Offer: NZ$1.20 per share in cash via scheme of arrangement.
  • Premium: 46.5% to 90-day VWAP (NZ$0.82) and 14.2x FY25 EBITDA.
  • Key Dates:
  • Shareholder vote (Scheme Meeting): Q3 2025 (expected).
  • Implementation: Q4 2025 (expected).
  • Conditions:
  • Shareholder + court approvals, Overseas Investment Act consent, no Material Adverse Change (impacting EBITDA >NZ$5.8m).
  • Board Recommendation: Unanimous support (subject to Independent Adviser’s valuation).
  • Substantial Shareholder Support: Microequities Asset Management (13.3% stake) backs the deal.
  • Exclusivity: Binding "no-shop" clause with break fees (NZ$2.96m each way).

No material operational/financial updates disclosed.

• Drilling commencement at Bousquet Gold Project (Canada) targeting high-grade gold prospects.
  • Phase 1 drilling: 2,400m (10 holes) at Paquin (9m @ 16.96g/t Au intercepts) and Decoeur Prospects.
  • Approved program: Up to 10,000m (38 holes) across multiple targets.
  • Location: Cadillac Break (host to >110Moz Au deposits).

No material trading or capital markets impact identified (exploration update only).
